name: Alice In Wonderland: Jingle Bells Season
name_original: Alice In Wonderland: Jingle Bells Season
description:
The Thorn Queen is angry as Erik, the Mad Hatter, tailored magic dresses making Alice invisible for the MirrorMan. The Thorn Queen is taking revenge by prohibiting Christmas and blaming Alice.

With the help of new friends Alice and her party try to save Christmas. Collect 2.000 gift packages to show Santa that you are serious about it.

CC credits: Charlie 3D model is based on the following 3D template: "Cartoon easter bunny" (Sketchfab model) by assetfactory https://skfb.ly/o9VFD is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
